title: Stop! No More Lies! (Ep 1327)
description:
In this episode, I address the alternate universe the Democrats are living in. The lies they keep repeating are so ridiculous that it’s hard to believe voting Democrats are buying their nonsense. 

News Picks:


New poll shows how shockingly ignorant people are about coronavirus due to media lies.

Tucker Carlson exposes the lunacy of the DNC.


New study suggests school closings are linked to influence of teacher’s unions, not school health or safety. 

Former FBI Spygate lawyer pleads guilty in Durham investigation.

This Obama State Department official makes a stunning revelation. 

Christopher Steele destroyed emails too. 

Democrats are destroying their own cities and towns in an effort to stick it to Trump. 


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
